export const createDocs = (Component) => (args) => {
  return (
    <StoryContextProviders>
      <Component {...args} />
    </StoryContextProviders>
  )
}

## AetherModal

export const AetherModalDocs = createDocs(AetherModal)
export const AetherModalConfig = aetherStoryDocs({ AetherModal }, getAetherModalProps)
